guiTeacher.interfaces

Interface Visible

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Clickable, Dragable, KeyedComponent, TextComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Accordion, AccordionTab, AnimatedComponent, Button, Checkbox, ClickableGraphic, Component, CustomImageButton, FileOpenButton, FullFunctionPane, Graphic, ImageTextButton, Link, MovingComponent, Pane, ProgressBar, RadioButton, RadioButtons, ScrollableDragablePane, ScrollablePane, SearchBox, SimpleTable, StyledComponent, TextArea, TextBox, TextColoredLabel, TextField, TextLabel, TypingPane

    public interface Visible
    Everything that can be shown within a window must implement this interface
    Author:
    bnockles

      • move

        static void move(Visible v,
                 int newX,
                 int newY,
                 int durationMS)
        Smoothly moves a Visible from its current x,y coordinates to new x,y coordinates over the specified duration
        Parameters:
        v - the Visible to be moved
        newX - the new x-coordinate of the Visible, within the context of the container
        newY - the new y-coordinate of the Visible, within the context of the container
        durationMS - the number of milliseconds the move will require
